mapper.sql: id, outtime, goodid, goodnumber, operatorid, deptid, standardnumber, comments,outrepositoryid
mapper.select: SELECT outrepositoryid, outr.id, outtime, goodname, goodtype, goodnumber, username, deptname, comments FROM outrepository outr LEFT JOIN goods ON goods.id = goodid LEFT JOIN user ON user.id = operatorid LEFT JOIN dept ON dept.id = deptid;
mapper.insert: insert into outrepository (id, outtime, goodid, goodnumber, operatorid, deptid, standardnumber, comments,outrepositoryid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{standardnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{outrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update outrepository
outtime = #{outtime,jdbcType=DATE},
goodid = #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodnumber = #{goodnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operatorid = #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

outrepositoryid = #{outrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
